title: Autonomous Vehicle Simulation
description: Built an autonomous driving pipeline using 8,000+ labeled frames. Designed a PyTorch autoencoder for feature extraction (<50 ms latency) and applied behavioral cloning (CNNs) to predict steering/throttle.

title: BlogSpace Application
